title: Ece seniors pls help regarding elective!
content: Since we have to choose electives now for 5th sem i have a few doubts regarding the "QCQE elective". Any seniors who have taken up this elective pls can i dm??

comments.body: Juts post your doubts here please
Wanted to know hows the elective overall nd will there be projects or esas as the final assesment. Also wanted to ask if the isas or esas r difficult since the subj is complex...
atleast for us, it was a project based ESA. ISAs are generally hard.
Is it hard to score an A grade?
depends on you, if u study well, u can get S only, why A.
